strIntroduction: Northern Thailand is the perfect location for exciting whitewater. With its warm , tropical weather, steep mountains, and beautiful scenery, the Mae Taeng is the nexus of fun in northern Thailand.

strIntroduction: Come to Santorini Water Fantasy to build the most fun memories in your mind！

strIntroduction: Bangkok Dream World is the biggest theme park in south east Asia, also known as “Disneyland in Thailand”, “Disneyland in Southeast Asia.” It offers four different areas; Dream World Plaza, Dream Garden, Fantasy Land, Adventure Land, catering to the needs of audience of different age!
strTitle: Bangkok Dream World Pass

strIntroduction: Massage is always considered one of the must do in Thailand. Have you ever imagines that you can relax at the same time help people? Try this Lila Thai Massage!

strIntroduction: Enjoy the best in Thai cuisine with Thai music and classical Thai dances.

strIntroduction: Visiting or living in Patong and want to try some of the best karting or recreation activities at the Gokart Speedway in Phuket, Thailand. Grand Prix go-kart, buggy racing, extreme sport, and leisure or team building corporate action and events on and offroad. Come and visit our kart and buggy park and experience the fun for yourself.

strIntroduction: Whilst you’re on holiday in Thailand why not experience the biggest thrill of your life? Feel the amazing rush by bungee jumping off a 60 metre high platform over a lake!

strIntroduction: There are many snorkel trips to Koh Tao on offer from Koh Samui but The Dive Academy provide the ultimate, value for money, VIP Snorkeling Tour on our purpose built speedboat "Midnight Blue".

strIntroduction: Make a reservation of your private transfer and get ready to enjoy your travel in Thailand!
strTitle: Chiang Mai to Chiang Rai Private Transfers

strIntroduction: Have fun and learn the traditional Thai Cooking taught by our very own chef. This is an ideal “easy and relax” learning environment where you can discover your cooking skills in a real hands-on cooking class that is set-up in a tranquil and serene surrounding.

strIntroduction: Let's Relax Pattaya 'Eastern Affinity' is a day spa in Pattaya, a place where you can indulge in a heavenly and carefree retreat of the tropical garden and the beautiful pond amidst the colorful city of Pattaya and effortlessly explore for a more jovial journeys and attractions.
strTitle: Let's Relax Spa Voucher (Pattaya)

strIntroduction: Wreck diving is one of the most exciting parts of diving! Explore an old ship wreck, somewhere out in the open sea. Who knows which mysterious reason made it sink?!
strTitle: 1 Day Dive Trip (2 dives) – Wreck Special

strIntroduction: New to diving? No problem! Practice the basics within an open water dive under full supervision of a dive leader.
strTitle: Introductory Dive (Phi Phi)

strIntroduction: Combine big time caving and world-class ziplining with a Homestay in a mountain tribe village for thrills beyond the imagination. Only in Thailand will you go high above and far below the amazing rainforest canopy with this popular adventure. Rappel 30 meters into a gaping black hole, fly between 33 platforms on ziplines, and experience Thai culture and food from inside the home of villager.
strTitle: Cave Exploring and Zipline 2 Days Tour

strIntroduction: Snorkel the white sand islands of Poda, Tup Islets, and Chicken Island, and watch a spectacular sunset in the Andaman Sea on an 8-hour tour from Krabi. Feast on an authentic barbecue dinner far from the hustle and bustle of the mainland.
strTitle: Krabi Romantic Sunset Cruise

strIntroduction: Mimosa Pattaya or "The City of Love" is a new style of attraction on over 20 acres in Pattaya. The place offers a perfect combination of French style of architecture boasting its elegant shopping atmosphere and glamorous Broadway musicals and the colourful Cabaret Show which what Pattaya is famous for.
strTitle: Mimosa Pattaya Entrance Pass

strIntroduction: Experience two of Phuket's highlights during one day! The morning will be spent on the white sandy beach of Racha Yai island and for lunch we head to the privacy of Mai Ton Island.
strTitle: Racha and Honeymoon Island One day Tour by Speed Boat (Chinese Guide) with Love Andaman

strIntroduction: 最近非常熱門的3D立體視覺博物館，也在曼谷開幕了哦！最佳殺底片的好去處，好玩好拍好好逛！
strTitle: Bangkok Art in Paradise 3D Museum Pass

strIntroduction: Just a short hop east of Chiang Mai we head away from the tourist trail and into fertile valleys that offer inspiring views and mountainous horizons not seen from the city. After a short drive from the city we start our bicycle exploration of Sankampaeng and the beautiful, peaceful Lanna countryside.
strTitle: Bike Through Lanna Countryside

strIntroduction: Like Cabaret show, Muay Thai Boxing is also a must see when you visit Thailand. Come to watch Sainamyen Boxing and enjoy this exciting game.

strIntroduction: Gibbons Love Elephants! Flight of the GibbonTM has teamed up with an elephant sanctuary to bring you an exciting two day tour program. You will spend the first day enjoying learning about elephants and spending some time with them. The second day, you’ll take on the highest rated zipline in Asia on your zipline canopy tour.
strTitle: Elephant Sanctuary and Zipline 2 Days Tour

strIntroduction: If you love golf, this is one course you must experience. Play one of Thailand's top golf courses, voted among the top new golf courses in Asia. Enjoy a night in a 5-­star villa followed by a Zipline Canopy Tour and create a vacation within your Thai vacation!

strIntroduction: Get an exciting adventure! Using 4X4 to go around the island and having lots of different experience!

strIntroduction: "Phuket's wettest wildest water park" providing gallons of excitement for the whole family!

strIntroduction: Ko Tachai, Ko Bon (2 islands of the Similan Islands National Marine Park ) and Premchai Wreck, with KKday and Sea Bees Diving you can dive these amazing sites in one day! Hop on board of the MC Stingray, Khao Lak’s state of the art high speed Catamaran. This trip is perfect for people who love to dive in warm seawater and relax on one of Thailand's most beautiful destinations: Khao Lak!

strIntroduction: Ride as high as you can in Thailand when taking on this challenging cycle of 20 kms and some 2000 m of ascent up to the top of the country's tallest mountain – Doi Inthanon. Then comes the reward of the longest and smoothest descent in Thailand!

strIntroduction: One of the most popular tour from Koh Lanta, showing you 4 unique islands where you can go snorkeling and kayaking.

strIntroduction: Koh Phangan is an Island in the northeast of Surat Thani, about 20 kilometers from Koh Samui. Its area of 170 square kilometers, or 106,250 rai, is surrounded by several minor islands such as Koh Tao, Koh Tae Nok, Koh Tae Nai, and Koh Ma.
strTitle: Phangan Island 1 day tour

strIntroduction: If you are a PADI holder and longing for a great diving experience, this is your best choice! Get a exciting and memorable liveaboard adventure with KKday！
strTitle: 3 Days 3 Nights Dive Trip - Similan and Surin

strIntroduction: Enjoy your Pattaya holiday with fun and unique water sport activities. Have a good time while parasailing and sea walking in the morning. Soak up the sun and go for a ride with the banana boat at noon. For the food lovers, a delicious seafood lunch set will be served. We provide Mandarin, Korean and English translation service
strTitle: Pattaya Beach Fun

strIntroduction: Bor Tor is a small coastal village at the top of Phang Nga Bay. There is a good concentration of caves or karst 'hongs' that can be accessed by sit-on-top kayaks, and the geology is amazing. There isn't as much wildlife as in Talin, but Bor Tor is rich in scenery.
strTitle: Kayaking Bor Thor Full Day

strIntroduction: Embark on a journey where the glittering world of music, dance, all stars performers in glamorous glittering costume perform dances and songs to distribute different cultures form countries around the world.
strTitle: Aphrodite Cabaret Show: Discount Ticket with Transfer

strIntroduction: Want to travel from Krabi to Koh Lipe stress free? Then book a transfer ticket with us and make your way to Koh Lipe in air-conditioned comfort with multiple departures.
strTitle: Travel from Krabi to Koh Lipe

strIntroduction: Mini Siam and Mini Europe is home to miniature of renowned buildings from all over the world, including Grand Palace of Thailand, Big Ben, Eiffel Tower… etc. Aside from that, it also offers various garden landscaping. The rich experience it has to offer would definitely make killer photos for your trip.
strTitle: Mini Siam and Mini Europe Pass

strIntroduction: 此趟旅程將帶您前往聖托里尼樂園、綿羊牧場、華欣火車站、往日情懷、創意市集夜市等知名特色景點，讓您不僅玩得盡興，還能體會泰國的多樣面貌！

strIntroduction: Did you ever wished, as a kid, that you could explore the secrets of the Zoo after dark? You can explore the zoo, hearing stories about animals, and experiencing theatrical that will surprise , move and delight you.

strIntroduction: One of the most famous sex show in Pattaya, Big Eye is now available in Phuket Island!

strIntroduction: Hin Daeng and Hin Muang are truly one of the best diving sites in Thailand, offering steep walls, big fish and colorful soft coral. Join us and discover this stunning underwater view!

strIntroduction: On this walk you will learn about the history of the old royal district of Rattanankosin Island, as we pass by some of Bangkok’s most famous landmarks.

strIntroduction: Koh larn is the biggest island away from the Pattaya, also be known as Coral island. Take only 45 minutes from Pattaya to Koh larn, it's time for you to embrace this glamours beach !
strTitle: Koh Larn 1 Day Snorkeling

strIntroduction: Manukan Island and Sapi Island are 2 of the most beautiful islands in Sabah. Enjoy this 1 day tour with KKday to experience the Malaysian excitements!

strIntroduction: LEGOLAND Malaysia Resort brings together a LEGOLAND Park, Water Park and Hotel in one LEGO® themed location. This is the only once in Asia and one of the must go attraction in Malaysia!

strIntroduction: Semporna is the paradise for snorkeling enthusiasts. Therefore island hopping tour is a must-do here. Come with KKday and explore the world under the sea.

strIntroduction: Located at Kota Belud township, Kawa Kawa wetland is newly opened by the authority of Sabah. As there is daily visitors limitation, the wetland here is more well-conserved. You can meet a lot of Proboscis Monkeys & Fireflies here and being impressed by the beautiful sunsetting view.
strTitle: Kawa Kawa Sunset River Cruise

strIntroduction: Mantanani Islands are a group of three isolated islands located northwest of Kota Belud. This place is well-known for the snorkeling spots and beautiful views underneath the ocean. Let's explore the natural wonderland with KKday.
strTitle: Mantanani Island 1 Day Snorkeling

strIntroduction: Discover the old and the new on this half-day tour which is designed to give you the best possible introduction to this bustling city and immerse yourself in the city’s character and charm. See the city’s most iconic landmarks including the King's Palace, National Monument, Independence Square and the famous Petronas Twin Towers. Sit back and enjoy a panoramic drive along the classy streets that reveals the contrasting sights of modern skyscrapers and colonial architecture.
strTitle: Kuala Lumpur City & Landmarks Half Day Tour

strIntroduction: KKday will bring you to experience multiple exciting Sabah activities in the 1 day trip, Kiulu Water Rafting, Zip Borneo and Kokol Hill Highland.
strTitle: Kiulu Water Rafting and Jungle Zipline Adventure

strIntroduction: How much highlights of Kinabalu you can enjoy at 1 day? KKday will bring you to discover the beautiful Mountain Kinabalu, famous Poring Hot Spring, natural fish spa, mysterious Canopy Walk and the BEST roasted wild roar!
strTitle: Explore Mt.Kinabalu Full Day

strIntroduction: Make your way to the district of Kuala Penyu and hop on a boat to Pulau Tiga! The island’s claim to fame is none other than being the first ever ‘secret’ location for the hit reality series, ‘Survivor’. Hence, many refer to Pulau Tiga as Survivor Island. Located just 10km off shore on the West Coast of Sabah, you can enjoy a day trip to the island but many recommend spending at least a night or two.
strTitle: Pulau Tiga Snorkeling and Jungle Trekking

strIntroduction: Paragliding has started in Sabah for quite some years and in recent years it becomes a popular sport. Come with KKday and explore Sabah from the blue sky.
strTitle: Renau Paragliding and Mt. Kinabalu Full Day Adventure

strIntroduction: Kelly Bay is a unique place for travelers to experience the special Sabah cultures. You can visit the wetland by taking the local boat and make your own Batik.
strTitle: Live Lika A Local- Kelly Bay 1 Day Trip

strIntroduction: Having a one day food tour in Kota Kinabaalu with visit to Sabah Museum or Lok Kawi Wildlife Park. Just book your tour now; let's go to explore the charm of Sabah without hesitation!
strTitle: A taste of the Kota Kinabalu Cuisine 1 Day Tour

strIntroduction: Explore the natural diversity of Sabah with KKday!
strTitle: Weston Wetland River Cruise

strIntroduction: Head out of the metropolis and visit the extraordinary Batu Caves, a limestone hill riddled with caves and cave temples. Climb the 272 steps to the shrine of Hindu Lord Murugan, visited by over a million pilgrims every year on the annual Thaipusam festival.
strTitle: Kuala Lumpur Countryside Delights - Batu Caves Half-Day Tour

strIntroduction: Don't know where to spend your summer time? Come with KKday, enjoy the tropical fruit feast and explore the natural diversity of Sabah!
strTitle: Summer Special－All-You-Can-Eat Fruit Buffet and Weston Wetland River Cruise

strIntroduction: Take a ride on the North Borneo Railway and relive the nostalgic romance of British North Borneo. Passengers experience the lush landscape of the coastal and rural regions of Sabah. A typical ‘tiffin’ colonial lunch will be served on the return trip.

strIntroduction: KKday provides you the exclusive charter tour service with local experienced guide and customized tour!

strIntroduction: Mantanani Island is one of the most beautiful in Sabah. KKday will bring you to enjoy diving in the extremely clean ocean and explore the sea world.

strIntroduction: The mix of cultures is what makes Malaysia so special and also makes Malaysian cuisine so delicious! Come with KKday and let us show you the truely Asia!

strIntroduction: Georgetown, named after King George III of England, has one of the largest colonial buildings in South East Asia.

strIntroduction: The first Sanrio Hello Kitty Town attraction outside of Japan consists of various interactive and walk-through activities, which follow the popular Hello Kitty theme.

strIntroduction: Experience the beauty of KK city via visiting the Signal Hill, Amazing Floating Mosque, and so on. This trip will end up with the souvenir shopping at traditional handicraft market.

strIntroduction: Still don't know how to travel light while at the same time travel profoundly in Malacca? Choosing the chartered car provided by KKday, you will have the best price and will enjoy the most comfortable travel in Malacca!

strIntroduction: You can never miss the mountain Kinabalu when coming to Sabah! Enjoying the view of mt. Kinabalu and Poring hot spring is considered one of the best way to savor the moment.

strIntroduction: Start your Sabah trip from KK city! KKday will bring you to explore the most famous Chinese temple, highest building, the interesting upside down house. Of course, the amazing sunset of Kokol Hill is included in the trip. You can also enjoy the Sabah style meals as lunch and dinner.

strIntroduction: The tour of the Bako National Park is certain to be a highlight of any Eco trip to Malaysia. This national park is going to reveal the unspoiled landscapes and different kinds of wildlife. Don't hesitate to join the tour to the must-visit park in Malaysia!

strIntroduction: You can never miss Kuala Lumpur by night, for this city showing a totally different facade toward tourists from around the world.. Come explore

strIntroduction: If you are mad about all things to do with action-packed activities or making a splash in the water, then come and discover a refreshing world of Sunway Lagoon water theme park, where every drop is loaded with fun to suit all tastes. Spanning over 80 acres, this theme park allows you to experience the adventure that often leaves the visitor with a sense of thrill and excitement.
strTitle: Sunway Lagoon Wet ‘n Wild

strIntroduction: We will bring you a memorable sunset tour in Sabah!
strTitle: Kasih Sayang Sunset Tour& Floating Mosque

strIntroduction: This evening tour takes you southwest of the city, travelling through the rural countryside. Reaching Kuala Selangor Wetland Reserve, you will be rewarded with a breathtaking scenery of the mangrove forests, home to an incredibly nocturnal beetle commonly called firefly.
strTitle: Firefly Phenomenon

strIntroduction: Enjoy a sit-in-coach tour of the Kuala Gandah Elephant Sanctuary (also called the Elephant Orphanage Sanctuary), an elephant conservation center managed by the Malaysian Wildlife Society. With your expert, friendly guide, you’ll discover the important work the elephant sanctuary does in protecting and safeguarding these orphaned elephants.
strTitle: Kuala Gandah Elephant Sanctuary

strIntroduction: Come to Sabah, Mt. Kinabalu is definitely a must-go place! You like challenges? Then join KKday Mt. Kinabalu tour!

strTitle: Padas River Water Rafting

strIntroduction: Tunku Abdul Rahman Park, not only suitable for snorkeling, diving and other water sport activities, it is also a good spot for fishing. Enjoy a great day of fishing even it is only a short boat ride away. Rich in marine life and natural wonders, a fishing trip to Tunku Abdul Rahman Park exposes even the most seasoned fisherman to prized ocean catches such as Garoupa fish, Red Carp fish, Catfish and more.
strTitle: 8 Hours Deep Sea Fishing in Sabah

strIntroduction: Go visiting Miri city with your favorite Sit-In-coach tour; It not only saves your money but also saves your time for finding the destinations by your own!
